title: Get the post privacy settings of a TikTok account

headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Access token authorized by TikTok creators. To obtain an access token, use /tt_user/oauth2/token/ .

parameters.name: business_id
parameters.description: Application specific unique identifier for the TikTok account. Pass the value of the open_id field returned in the response of /tt_user/oauth2/token/ to this field.

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: Response code. For the complete list of response codes and descriptions, see Appendix-Return Code .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: Response message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: request_id
top_fields.description: The log ID of a request, which uniquely identifies the request.

fields.name: privacy_level_options
fields.description: The available privacy level options for the TikTok account's posts. If the TikTok account is a public account, the enum values are: PUBLIC_TO_EVERYONE : Everyone (people on or off TikTok). MUTUAL_FOLLOW_FRIENDS : Friends (followers you follow back). SELF_ONLY : Only you. If the TikTok account is a private account, the enum values are: FOLLOWER_OF_CREATOR : Followers (Visible only to followers on your private account). MUTUAL_FOLLOW_FRIENDS : Friends (followers you follow back). SELF_ONLY : Only you.

fields.name: comment_disabled
fields.description: Whether the "Allow comments" setting is available for the TikTok account's posts. Supported values: true : unavailable. You cannot enable the setting for the TikTok account's posts. If you have set the comment privacy settings for your TikTok account as allowing comments from No one , this field will be true . false : available. You can either enable or disable the setting for the TikTok account's posts.

fields.name: duet_disabled
fields.description: Whether the "Allow Duets" setting is available for the TikTok account's posts. Supported values: true : unavailable. You cannot enable the setting for the TikTok account's posts. If you have set the Duet privacy settings for your TikTok account as allowing Duet from Only you or if your TikTok account is a private account, this field will be true . false : available. You can either enable or disable the setting for the TikTok account's posts.

fields.name: stitch_disabled
fields.description: Whether the "Allow Stitch" setting is available for the TikTok account's posts. Supported values: true : unavailable. You cannot enable the setting for the TikTok account's posts. If you have set the Stitch privacy settings for your TikTok account as allowing Stitch from Only you or if your TikTok account is a private account, this field will be true . false : available. You can either enable or disable the setting for the TikTok account's posts.

fields.name: max_video_post_duration_sec
fields.description: The maximum duration for video posts that the TikTok account can publish in seconds. If you attempt to publish a video post longer than the maximum duration via /business/video/publish/ , the publishing attempt will fail.
